      • getInstance

        public static PreferenceControl getInstance​(android.content.Context c)
        Singleton class for exporting and importing external preferences into the system.

      • dispose

        public static void dispose()

      • connect

        public void connect()
        Preserves the original intent of connecting. Now that the PreferenceControl is started early, allow for this to be called in the original location. This should not be called during the ATAKActivity instantiation.

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()

      • getAllPreferences

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​android.content.SharedPreferences> getAllPreferences()
        Obtains all of the Shared Preferences used by the system. Please note that the preference do contain private device specific information. If transferring to a new device please omit the key "bestDeviceUID", if cloning please omit the key "bestDeviceUID" and "locationCallsign".
        Returns:
        a hashmap containing the preference name as the key and the SharedPreference as a value.

      • saveSettings

        public void saveSettings​(java.lang.String path)

      • ingestDefaults

        public boolean ingestDefaults()
        Loads a new default set of configuration options and then removes the file containing these values. This is useful for staging a system once and then pushing configuration changes out to many system post deployment. The file is named default and it is required to be in the prefs directory. The prefs directory can either be internal or external. All other preferences are loaded from just the internal card. XXX - This is a partial fix for the staging of defaults to devices where ClockworkMod recovery is being used to stage the devices.

      • loadSettings

        public void loadSettings​(java.lang.String path,
                         boolean bCheckConnection)
        Given a configuration file under the prefs directory, load the settings
        Parameters:
        path - the filename for the preference file
        bCheckConnection - if the connection should be checked before loading the preference file and toast as necessary.

      • loadPartialSettings

        @Deprecated
@DeprecatedApi(since="5.1",
               removeAt="5.4",
               forRemoval=true)
public void loadPartialSettings​(android.content.Context context,
                                java.lang.String path,
                                boolean bCheckConnection,
                                java.lang.String[] categorySet)
        Deprecated.
        The concept was to load only a specific category of preferences. This is woefully out of date and probably not working properly

      • loadSettings

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> loadSettings​(java.io.File configFile)
        Loads the settings, and optionally performs a connection check to see if the CotServiceRemote is running (leaving that in as legacy)
        Returns:
        list of keys that were imported.

      • loadSettings

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> loadSettings​(java.io.InputStream is)
                                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Loads the settings from all categories, and optionally performs a connection check to see if the CotServiceRemote is running (leaving that in as legacy)
        Parameters:
        is - the input stream to process
        Returns:
        list of keys that were imported.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • loadSettings

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> loadSettings​(java.io.InputStream is,
                                                     int type)
                                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Loads the settings, and optionally performs a connection check to see if the CotServiceRemote is running (leaving that in as legacy)
        Parameters:
        is - the input stream to process
        type - the type to process (LOAD_ALL_PREFERENCES, LOAD_CONNECTION_PREFERENCE, LOAD_OTHER_PREFERENCES)
        Returns:
        list of keys that were imported.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • onCotServiceConnected

        public void onCotServiceConnected​(android.os.Bundle fullServiceState)
        Specified by:
        onCotServiceConnected in interface CotServiceRemote.ConnectionListener
        Parameters:
        fullServiceState - (Bundle[]) fullServiceState.getParcelableArray("streams") which appears to be and array of all of the current TAK servers bundle made up of TAKServer.DESCRIPTION_KEY, TAKServer.ENABLED_KEY, TAKServer.CONNECTED_KEY lifted from CotStreamListener

        fullServiceState can also contain (Bundle[]) fullServiceState.getParcelableArray(getPortType()) which follows the same rules above. lifted from CotPortListActivity

        Specified by:
